item.description:

You didn’t add the tutorial fully, or it wasn’t posted fully. Here, add this tutorial:

programming, irc, cars

item.title: Dude this is so a waste of my time
item.dc:creator: @Taylor_John0 Taylor John0
item.description:
@Taylor_John0 wrote:

//Rune if(removeID == 1263 || removeID == 4585 || removeID == 4087 || removeID == 1305 || removeID == 4587 || removeID == 1187 || removeID == 1377 || removeID == 5680 || removeID == 1215 || removeID == 1434 || removeID == 5698 || removeID == 1231 || removeID == 3176 || removeID == 5716 || removeID == 1249 || removeID == 3204 || removeID == 6739 || removeID == 5730 || removeID == 1263 || removeID == 4585 || removeID == 4087 || removeID == 1305 || removeID == 4587 || removeID == 1187 || removeID == 1377 || removeID == 5680 || removeID == 1215 || removeID == 1434 || removeID == 5698 || removeID == 1231 || removeID == 3176 || removeID == 5716 || removeID == 1249 || removeID == 3204 || removeID == 6739 || removeID == 5730) { return 2357; } //Dragon if(removeID == 1149 || removeID == 7158 || removeID == 3140 || removeID == 1213 || removeID == 3101 || removeID == 1432 || removeID == 1147 || removeID == 1289 || removeID == 1333 || removeID == 1303 || removeID == 1163 || removeID == 1185 || removeID == 1347 || removeID == 1373 || removeID == 1113 || removeID == 1201 || removeID == 1079 || removeID == 1093 || removeID == 1319 || removeID == 1127 || removeID == 824 || removeID == 4824 || removeID == 0044 || removeID == 868); { return 2365; } } public int barsNeeded(int slot, int column) { if (column == 1119) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 1) return 1; if (slot == 2 || slot == 3) return 2; if (slot == 4) return 3; } if (column == 1120) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 1) return 1; if (slot == 2 || slot == 3) return 3; if (slot == 4) return 2; } if (column == 1121) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 1 || slot == 2) return 3; if (slot == 3) return 5; if (slot == 4) return 1; } if (column == 1122) { if (slot == 0 || slot == 4) return 1; if (slot == 1 || slot == 2) return 2; if (slot == 3) return 3; }

that got changed and now when i smith it says i don’t have enough bars for EVERYTHING
